item.description: That cgo will automagically ship a C.sizeof_YourStruct for every C struct that you can reference as C.YourStruct. This is useful for pointer arithmetic via unsafe.Pointer(uintptr(something) + uintptr(intIndex * C.sizeof_YourStruct)).
